column1: The '''Most Excellent Order of the British Empire''' is an order of chivarly in the British honours system
column3: with five classes in civil and military divisions.

column1: Queen Elizabeth II appointed [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] a Commander of the Order of the British Empire in the New Year Honours of [[1 January]] [[1972]] "For services to English Literature".<ref>{{webcite|articleurl=http://www.thegazette.co.uk/London/issue/45554/supplement/9|articlename=SUPPLEMENT TO THE LONDON GAZETTE
column2: p. 9|website=The London Gazette|dated=1 January 1 1972}}</ref> Tolkien received the insignia of the Order at Buckingham Palace on [[28 March]].<ref>{{L|334}}</ref>
